explanation: The stage direction describes a library with empty shelves, and the presence of characters Sainte-Beuve and a devil disguised as a student. This is a description of the stage setting or play location, fitting the definition of Category 11: setting.
stgdir: Une bibliothèque dont tous les rayons sont vides ; au milieu, Sainte-Beuve, et à son côté un diable, travesti en étudiant.
